theory_intentional_crash.text: The physics of the turn... it wasn't an accident. It was a precise, calculated descent.

theory_supernatural_residue.text: The residue is humming. It's not just a stain; it's a beacon.

theory_ghost_machine.text: The static in the room isn't white noise. It's a conversation you aren't part of.

theory_nightmares_mean_something.text: Teeth. The way the wood is splintered... it looks like teeth.
